definitions.definition: Of, relating to, consisting of, or used in a ceremony .
Synonym of ceremonious ( “ of a person : fond of ceremony or ritual, or of observing strict etiquette or formality ; punctilious ” ) .

main_definition: Of, relating to, consisting of, or used in a ceremony .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Synonym of ceremonious ( “ of a person : fond of ceremony or ritual, or of observing strict etiquette or formality ; punctilious ” ) .
